title: Asylum
description: There is nothing in the world better than loving what you are. No hiding, no pretending. Simply shaking out your soul and smiling at the world.Kassidy Elliot loved who she was, what she was. Being a Shifter was the best, finally being accepted, and welcomed, into the Pack officially? That was the goal, and she finally got in! But being Pack came with responsibility, and Kassi realizes that life isnâ€™t as easy as she thought.And sometimes you must obey the ancient laws of the hidden world to find the light...**This is a slow burn Reverse Harem novel. One female, three males. It DOES end in a cliffhanger, but rest assured, book two is in progress.**
author: Francesca Vance
